thread.title: Jeremy Kyle has 'most heartbreaking episode EVER' as man finds out his son of 32 years isn't his in DNA test
thread.title_full: Jeremy Kyle has 'most heartbreaking episode EVER' as man finds out his son of 32 years isn't his in DNA test

author: Hayley Minn
title: Jeremy Kyle has 'most heartbreaking episode EVER' as man finds out his son of 32 years isn't his in DNA test
text:
Jeremy Kyle has 'most heartbreaking episode EVER' as man finds out his son of 32 years isn't his in DNA test Oscar brought Valentine up for 32 years - but he's not his dad! Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Jeremy Kyle guest has heartbreaking reaction to DNA test results Share this video Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Jeremy Kyle was absolutely stunned on his show today, as he read out the results of a DNA test. 
Valentine had brought his dad Oscar on the ITV show, after being told a month ago by his mum the man who had brought him up for the last 32 years may not actually be his dad. 
Oscar has brought up Valentine, “brought him to England from Nigeria and put him through school”. 
So Jeremy did a DNA test on the two men to find out the truth. Read More Oscar had brought up Valentine as his son for 32 years (Photo: ITV) Valentine's mum had suddenly told him a month ago Oscar may not be his dad (Photo: ITV) Oscar's not Valentine's dad (Photo: ITV) Oscar's reaction was heartbreaking (Photo: ITV) Valentine was devastated (Photo: ITV) 
And it tragically turned out Oscar isn’t Valentine’s real dad. 
On finding out the news, Oscar let out the most heartbreaking wail. 
But Jeremy said: “Being a dad isn’t about being blood-related. It takes a man to look after a kid.” 
Jeremy was stunned by the news, and viewers were too. Read More Viewers couldn't believe it (Photo: ITV) It was genuinely shocking (Photo: ITV) It may have been the saddest episode ever (Photo: ITV) 
One said, “Saddest Jeremy Kyle”, while another added, “Heartbreaking”. 
A third agreed: “That was sad,i feel for them...But that noise he made, had me shook!!! #jeremykyle.” 
Another said: “Oh my god in an emotional wreck im crying my eyes out at Jeremy Kyle.” 
*The Jeremy Kyle Show continues on ITV1 weekdays at 9.25am Like us on Facebook
